  • Uses of Dice in net.royalur.rules.standard

    Classes in net.royalur.rules.standard that implement Dice
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    StandardDice
    Follows the standard probability distribution for dice of the Royal Game of Ur, which consist of four D2 die.
    class 
    StandardDiceWith0AsMax
    A set of dice where rolling a zero actually gives you the highest roll, instead of no moves.
